sentences.en: 'Good - by and good riddance!'she said to him angrily as he left.
sentences.cn: 他离开时, 她生气地冲他说: “ 再见,你可算走了! ”

sentences.en: A good riddance of bad rubbish.
sentences.cn: 眼中钉(讨厌的人)离开好.

sentences.en: For a moment it was on Scarlett's hot tongue to cry: " Go and good riddance! "
sentences.cn: 这时,思嘉很想说: " 滚就滚吧! " 话都说到嘴边停了,冷静一想,还是很慎重.

sentences.en: He was indeed a good riddance.
He's gone at last, and good riddance ( to him ) !
sentences.cn: 他终于走了, 谢天谢地!

sentences.en: He's gone back to London in a huff and good riddance.
sentences.cn: 他已经怒气冲冲地回伦敦了，总算把他打发走了。

sentences.en: His departure will be a good riddance for us.
sentences.cn: 他的离开对我们而言是个很好的摆脱.

sentences.en: I left Texas and said good riddance to all that.
sentences.cn: 我离开了得克萨斯州，总算摆脱了那里的一切。

sentences.en: Let us have riddance of these evils.
My boyfriend has walked out on me and good riddance t him!
sentences.cn: 我的男朋友离开了我,谢天谢地,我总算摆脱他了!

sentences.en: She was awful. Good riddance to her, I say!
sentences.cn: 她很讨厌。 我说啊，她滚蛋了真好！

sentences.en: They [ Their departure ] will be a good riddance.
They made a complete riddance of the mice in the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 他们把仓库里的老鼠消灭光了.

sentences.en: When Mr. Robert's old car was stolen, he thought it was good riddance.
sentences.cn: 当罗伯特先生的旧车被偷走时, 他认为是除掉一件麻烦东西.

sentences.en: You're better off without that jerk Good riddance, I say.
sentences.cn: 少了那个混球你过得好多了.我是说,他走了最好.

phrases.tran_cn: （表达庆幸）谢天谢地总算摆脱了（讨厌的人或事物）

trans.tran_cn: （用以表示庆幸的感叹）谢天谢地，总算摆脱了
trans.tran_en: a rude way of saying you are glad someone has left
